mapper.insert: insert into chat_message( chat_room_no, chat_message_no, member_id, chat_message_time, chat_message_content, attachment_no ) values( #{chatRoomNo}, #{chatMessageNo}, #{memberId}, sysdate, #{chatMessageContent}, null )
mapper.select: select * from chat_message where chat_room_no = #{chatRoomNo} order by chat_message_no asc
